name: Below Decks
description:
To keep a pirate ship running, you have to work together - as above deck, so below deck.

Shoot enemy boats, keep yourself afloat and get the treasure! Yaaargh!

Have fun on the open seas!

- Team JellyfishesAndMore

Team:

  • Manuel Glock , Lead Designer, 3D-Artist 
  • Feri Nagy , Programming, Game Design
  • Ivan Bird , Designer and Graphics Programmer 
  • Ricardo “TakkoPanda” Borroto , Sound Design, Implementation
  • Felix Wilson , Composer
